text: Ammonium sulfide is a chemical compound. The chemical is also known as the "stink bomb" is made up of a solution of ammonium sulfide in water, sealed inside a glass ampoule (a small bottle-like container used to store a liquid securely). When the ampoule is broken, ammonia and hydrogen sulfide gases are released from the solution. These chemicals have a very strong and pungent smell. ==References== Category:Sulfides Category:Ammonium salts
title: Ammonium sulfide
